title: Topic 01 Question 16
body: Your company has three virtual machines (VMs) that are included in an availability set.
You try to resize one of the VMs, which returns an allocation failure message.
It is imperative that the VM is resized.
Which of the following actions should you take?
options: You should only stop one of the VMs.
You should stop two of the VMs.
You should stop all three VMs.
You should remove the necessary VM from the availability set.
